section.p:
You report the position of the raiders. The army moves against them, and a short battle ensues in which the nomad warband is defeated. It transpires that a prince of the Court of Hidden Faces happened to be in the village at the time on a hunting trip; he would have been killed or captured by the nomads had you not been successful in your scouting mission.
